name: Happy Birthday LadyCibia
description:
HAPPY BIRTHDAY LADYCIBIA!!!

When your friend is such a wonderful person that she deserve to be protagonist in a videogame

Happy birthday Ladycibia!

The whole project was made as a one man band in two weeks, and got some help with the writing by spaceaceban


Original character that you meet in the game:

Mira Rune by aemdraws
Hazel Atkins by wickedica
Neon M. Welkin by neonbluewaves

Sounds by freesounds
Musics by digccmixter

there are a lot of inside jokes in this game, but it's still kinda random/funny i guess

.

This project will not be developed furthermore, but please signal any bug you see cause i might fix them! Thankj you!
